title: SOLD SOLD SOLD 2 T206 Unc. Errors - Marquard Reverse Comma + Leifield Partial G
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: SOLD SOLD SOLD 2 T206 Unc. Errors - Marquard Reverse Comma + Leifield Partial G
posts.post_content:
These two are currently un-cataloged, so PSA or SGC will not recognize them yet (I tried), but Bob Lemke has submitted them for inclusion to the Standard Catalog, as you can see in his posts here:
[url]http://boblemke.blogspot.com/2011/05/four-more-t206-error-listings.html[/url]
[url]http://boblemke.blogspot.com/2011/05/two-t206-marquards-hit-with-errors.html[/url]

As we all know, his work was not included in the 2012 Edition, which is a bummer, but hopefully they'll be included next year. I can't guarantee that, of course, but if you have the patience to wait for them to be cataloged, there's likely money to be made. I'm tired of waiting, personally, and just want to move these at this point.

[url]trae@t206.org[/url]
Emails have priority.
Pay however you like.
Postage included.

BOTH CARDS SOLD

Offers welcome.

(Factory short, not trimmed, in my opinion)
